person.persName: Marcus R. Everett (Montgomery County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Everett and Henrietta Everett. Married to Elizabeth Ragan Everett. Father of Samuel Everett. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Resident of Montgomery County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860.
